title: OAuth Authentication Success
description: Validate successful login using OAuth method with correct credentials, session creation, and token storage.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Select OAuth login option
Provide valid OAuth credentials and authorize app
Submit authentication
Verify user is redirected to main dashboard
Verify session token is stored securely and JWT is valid

title: OAuth Authentication Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify appropriate error messages and no session creation when logging in with invalid OAuth credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Select OAuth login option
Provide invalid OAuth credentials and attempt to authorize
Verify error message indicating authentication failure is shown
Verify no session token is created or stored

title: WhatsApp OTP Login Success
description: Validate user can login using WhatsApp OTP with correct phone number and OTP code, session is created, and UI updates accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Select WhatsApp OTP login option
Enter valid phone number
Request OTP
Enter received OTP correctly
Submit OTP verification
Verify login success and redirection to main dashboard
Verify session token is stored securely

title: WhatsApp OTP Login Failure with Invalid OTP
description: Verify system handles incorrect or expired WhatsApp OTP gracefully with clear error messages and no session created.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Select WhatsApp OTP login option
Enter valid phone number
Request OTP
Enter an invalid or expired OTP
Submit OTP verification
Verify error message indicating invalid or expired OTP
Verify no session token is created

title: Email Login Success
description: Verify successful login with valid email and password credentials including password validation, session handling and UI update.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Select email login option
Enter valid email and password
Click submit
Verify successful login and redirect to main dashboard
Verify session token is stored securely

title: Email Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Verify system response and error handling when user attempts login with incorrect password or invalid email format.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Select email login option
Enter valid email but incorrect password
Click submit
Verify error message related to invalid credentials is displayed
Verify no session token is created

title: Task CRUD Operations
description: Verify all CRUD operations on tasks work successfully including create, read, update and delete with validation and status tracking.

steps.description: Login to application and navigate to task management page
Create a new task with all required fields and submit
Verify the created task is visible in task list with accurate details
Update the task details including status and assigned user
Verify updated task details persist and are displayed correctly
Delete the task
Verify task no longer appears in task list

title: Task Advanced Filtering and Sorting
description: Verify task list filters correctly by search text, priority, status, and assignee; and supports sorting with clear all filters functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to Unified Task View
Apply search filter with a valid keyword
Verify task list shows only tasks matching search criteria
Apply filters for priority, status, and assignees
Verify tasks are filtered correctly based on selected filters
Use sorting options to reorder tasks by priority and due date
Verify tasks are sorted as per selected criteria
Click 'Clear all' filters button
Verify all filters are reset and full task list is restored

title: Task Assignment with Empty User List Handling
description: Test behavior of task assignment feature when team member list is empty and fallback UI messages are displayed correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to task creation page with no available team members
Attempt to assign task to a user
Verify fallback message indicating no users are available to assign
Verify user cannot submit task without valid assignment

title: Project Management Lifecycle
description: Validate creating projects, assigning team members with role permissions, milestone tracking and project-specific task organization.

steps.description: Navigate to projects page
Create a new project with required fields
Verify project appears in projects list with correct details
Assign team members to project with different roles
Verify member roles are correctly saved and enforced
Add and update project milestones
Verify milestone status updates reflect correctly on project UI
Link tasks to project and verify their correct association
Verify tasks are displayed in project context and can be filtered accordingly

title: Template System CRUD and Application
description: Verify task templates can be created, edited, applied to new tasks, and support project assignments with no UI errors or validation failures.

steps.description: Navigate to Templates page
Create a new task template including project assignment
Verify new template is saved and listed
Edit an existing template and save changes
Verify template updates are persisted and correctly displayed
Create a new task using a selected template
Verify task is pre-filled with template data and successfully created

title: Team Management Role Assignment and Invitations
description: Verify team managers can add, edit, and invite users, assign roles with permission enforcement, and edit user profiles correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Team Management page as team manager
Invite a new user by email and assign role
Verify invite is sent and user appears in pending list
Edit role of an existing team member
Verify updated roles reflect accurately and enforcement rules apply
Edit user profile details and save changes
Verify profile updates are persisted and visible

title: WhatsApp Integration Messaging and OTP Verification
description: Test sending and receiving WhatsApp messages, webhook event handling, and OTP verification workflows via WhatsApp API.

steps.description: Navigate to WhatsApp administration interface
Send WhatsApp message to a valid contact
Verify message delivery confirmation and UI update
Receive WhatsApp message via webhook and confirm processing
Verify inbound message is logged and shown in contact manager
Initiate OTP verification flow via WhatsApp
Enter received OTP and submit
Verify authentication success or failure messages correctly shown

title: Analytics Dashboard Accuracy and Interactivity
description: Verify analytics dashboard displays accurate real-time data including task metrics, team performance, priority breakdowns, and interactive charts.

steps.description: Navigate to Analytics dashboard
Verify key metrics (task counts, completed, overdue) are correct based on backend data
Interact with charts and filter options
Verify charts update correctly on filter application and display accurate data
Verify performance metrics for teams display as expected

title: Main Dashboard Navigation and Quick Actions
description: Validate main dashboard correctly aggregates recent activities, quick actions, and statistics with working navigation to all major features.

steps.description: Login and navigate to main dashboard
Verify recent activities list displays latest valid events
Verify quick action buttons navigate to their respective features correctly
Verify statistics overview displays up-to-date data

title: Modal and Dialog Accessibility and Stability
description: Test modals and dialogs for prevention of unexpected closures, proper focus trapping and release, and accessibility compliance.

steps.description: Open a modal or dialog such as Create Project or Edit Task
Attempt to interact outside modal or use keyboard shortcuts
Verify modal does not close unexpectedly and focus remains inside modal
Close modal via explicit close button or escape key
Verify focus is returned to previously focused UI element
Verify modal elements have appropriate ARIA attributes and labels

title: API Error Response Handling
description: Validate frontend handles consistent HTTP error status codes and shows user-friendly error messages for API failures.

steps.description: Mock backend API failures for login, task creation, and project updates
Trigger API calls through UI actions
Verify error messages appear with correct content per HTTP status code
Verify no inconsistent UI state or app crashes

title: Security: JWT Token Validation and Local Storage Cleanup
description: Ensure JWT tokens are validated on every session and localStorage is cleaned on logout or token expiration.

steps.description: Login and obtain JWT token
Verify token is stored in localStorage securely
Manipulate token to invalid value and refresh app
Verify user is logged out and localStorage is cleared
Logout normally
Verify localStorage/data related to tokens and sessions is cleared

title: Navigation and Routing Protection
description: Verify protected routes prevent unauthorized access, deep linking works, and browser history is managed correctly in SPA.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected page without authentication via direct URL
Verify redirect to login page
Login and navigate to protected route
Verify page loads correctly and URL parameters are respected
Use browser back and forward buttons
Verify navigation and component rendering matches expected route

title: Form Validation for Email and Password Inputs
description: Validate all relevant forms enforce email format, password strength, and input sanitization with user-friendly error feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to login or signup forms
Input invalid email formats and observe validation
Verify error messages for invalid email formats
Input weak passwords not meeting criteria
Verify password strength validation errors appear
Attempt to submit forms with invalid data
Verify form submission is blocked until inputs are valid
